explainers: Strong public interest in diabetes management

news_articles.title: Metformin Shows Promise in New Diabetes Management Study
news_articles.snippet: A recent study indicates Metformin continues to be effective for Type 2 diabetes management.

news_articles.title: Generic Metformin Sales Surge Amid Rising Diabetes Cases
news_articles.snippet: Global sales of generic Metformin have increased by 15% year-over-year.

news_articles.title: FDA Approves Extended-Release Metformin Formulation
news_articles.snippet: New extended-release formulation offers better patient compliance.
